1_1NmT7R64j1uMJ9qs3Bfgda5cGczFqNmCBL.body: Python to start out, its simple and will teach beautiful practices. Then something like GO will teach you more hardcore concepts that will help you. The basic OOP nature of things stays the same across OOP languages, so learning a language with as little quarks and nuances that is as simple as possible to teach the OOP nature will help you the most. Learning the quarks and nuances of GO later on may help you see how things can be different and yet powerful because it is different.
